main event: A witness observed a red hazy, round object in the sky near Albany, Oregon on 14 December 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for two hours and 28 minutes,The object was described as brightening and dimming,With two bars resembling a wingspan 25 feet below the object,The object was stationary during the observation,The pilot involved in the report scoured the area but found nothing except a full moon.
witness description: pilot involved in scouring the area
